com.nannalin

Interface Deck


  • public interface Deck

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card drawFromTop()
      Deals a card from the top of the deck.
      int getSize()
      Retrieves the number of cards in the deck.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Specifies if the deck is empty or not
      void reset()
      Reset the deck in a complete and unshuffled state.
      void shuffle()
      Randomizes the cards in the deck.

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Retrieves the number of cards in the deck.
        Returns:
        the number of cards left in the deck after dealing.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Specifies if the deck is empty or not
        Returns:
        true if the deck is empty, otherwise false.

      • drawFromTop

        Card drawFromTop()
        Deals a card from the top of the deck.
        Returns:
        card that is on the top of the deck.
        Throws:
        IllegaStateException - If there is no card left in the deck.

      • shuffle

        void shuffle()
        Randomizes the cards in the deck.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the deck in a complete and unshuffled state.
